featured.text: These folk healers also use observation and logic, but they are not so aware of it.
According to the passage, which of the following statements is true? (A) Folk healers choose different herbs to cure diseases without any sound basis.

definition.zh_def: 治療者；能夠治癒他人身心疾病的人。
definition.en_def: A person who heals or is capable of healing others, especially in a physical or spiritual sense.
definition.example: The healer used ancient techniques to help the villagers recover from their ailments.
